articles.title: 5 best new restaurant openings and dining updates in Boston (Feb. 12, 2026)
articles.description:
Stay up to date on the best new restaurants, recent openings, and the biggest dining updates across Greater Boston's food scene.

The post 5 best new restaurant openings and dining updates in Boston (Feb. 12, 2026) appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Discover five new restaurants opening in Boston as of February 12, 2026.
Notable openings include 'The Green Plate' and 'Seafood Haven' in downtown Boston.
These additions enhance dining options for residents and boost local economy.
